QuestData.Title: Gorgrom the Dragon-Eater
QuestData.Description: The gronn we seek is Gorgrom the Dragon-Eater. With Sablemane's trap, you will make short work of the gronn. You will find him accepting sacrifices from the ogres of Boulder'mok.$b$bFollow the road north from the Circle of Blood, then west at Ruuan Weald. Go northwest through the tunnel.$b$bFirst, kill the ogres for their heads. We will send a message. Set the trap at his altar. When he is dead, plant the grisly totems near him - none can mistake that message.$b$bTake the bear.$b$b<Misha growls.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 3 Grisly Totems from the Boulder'mok ogres. Then, use Sablemane's Trap at Gorgrom's Altar to set the trap and summon and kill Gorgrom the Dragon-Eater.$b$bWhen Gorgrom is dead, place the 3 Grisly Totems near his corpse.
QuestData.CompletionText: The Bloodmaul ogres will trouble us no longer when this task is done.
QuestData.RewardText: The ogres of Bloodmaul and their master, Gorgrom, will trouble the Mok'Nathal no longer.$B$BHowever, I worry about the effect our actions will have on the other gronn. I believe we must end this fight once and for all.
